questions.question: Choose the correct form: At 8 PM yesterday, I ___ TV.
What is the structure of Past Continuous?
Fill in the blank: They ___ (not work) when I called.
When do we use Past Continuous?
options: For actions in progress at specific past time
questions.correctAnswer: For actions in progress at specific past time

questions.question: Fill in the blank: What ___ you ___ (do) at 5 o'clock yesterday?
Which sentence describes interrupted action?
options: I was cooking when the phone rang.
questions.correctAnswer: I was cooking when the phone rang.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: While I ___ (walk) home, it started to rain.
What is the question form for 'they were sleeping'?
Fill in the blank: She ___ (study) all evening yesterday.
Choose the correct sentence with two simultaneous actions:
options: While I cooked, she was setting the table.
While I was cooking, she was setting the table.
I cooked while she set the table.
I was cooking while she set the table.
questions.correctAnswer: While I was cooking, she was setting the table.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The children ___ (play) in the garden at that time.
